turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can help set that up for you. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order four medium, thick-crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like two of them veggie lover's and two meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'd be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 4 medium thick crust pizzas, 2 veggie lovers, and 2 meat lovers. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total for the order is $56.44. should i place the order for pick up, or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivered, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the price for delivery is an additional $5.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that alright?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order will be delivered in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
